message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Random' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.handlers.setup.components.SpawnComponents'.
WhitespaceAround: 'switch' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
